network

Class Switch<T extends Message>

  • java.lang.Object
    • network.Node<T>
      • network.DeferredSchedulingNode<T>
        • network.Switch<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - 

    public class Switch<T extends Message>
extends DeferredSchedulingNode<T>
    Implements a schedule-based switch.

    A switch will perform no action on an update, and will exception upon processing a message destined for it.

    Author:
    Bitidork

      Constructors

      Switch(Scheduler<T> scheduler)
      Constructs a switch following the supplied scheduler.
